member.name: M:Janus.Windows.UI.Dock.UIPanelBase.GetMaximumSize
member.summary: Gets the maximum size of the panel.
member.returns: Returns a System.Drawing.Size that represents the limits for the panel size.
member.remarks: If the Width and Height of the MaximumSize are -1 this method returns the MaximumSize specified as default in the panel manager. If the Width and Height are 0 the panel will have no limits other than the size of its container.

member.name: M:Janus.Windows.UI.Dock.UIPanelBase.GetMinimumSize
member.summary: Gets the minimum size of the panel.
member.returns: Returns a System.Drawing.Size that represents the limits for the panel size.
member.remarks: If the Width and Height of the MinimumSize are -1 this method returns the MinimumSize specifed as default in the panel manager.

member.summary: Indicates that the setting for the property should be inherited from the parent UIFormatStyle.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.UI.BackgroundGradientMode.Solid
member.summary: Specifies that no gradient should be used.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.UI.BackgroundGradientMode.Vertical
member.summary: Specifies that a vertical gradient should be used.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.UI.BackgroundGradientMode.Horizontal
member.summary: Specifies that a horizantal gradient should be used.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.UI.BackgroundGradientMode.Diagonal
member.summary: Specifies that a diagonal gradient should be used (from upper left to lower right).

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.UI.BackgroundGradientMode.DiagonalBackwards
member.summary: Specifies that a inverted diagonal gradient should be used (from lower right to upper left).

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.UI.Appearance
member.summary: Specifies the 3D appearance of an area in a control.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.UI.Appearance.Empty
member.summary: Undefined. The value of the property will be inherited from the parent UIFormatStyle object.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.UI.Appearance.Flat
member.summary: Areas are drawn flat. No 3D effect.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.UI.Appearance.Normal
member.summary: Areas are drawn with a double 3D raised border.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.UI.Appearance.Light3D
member.summary: Areas are drawn with a single 3D raised border.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.UI.Appearance.FlatBorderless
member.summary: The control has no border.

member.name: T:Janus.Windows.UI.BackgroundImageDrawMode
member.summary: Specifies how the back ground image is drawn.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.UI.BackgroundImageDrawMode.Empty
member.summary: Undefined. The value of the property will be inherited from the parent UIFormatStyle object.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.UI.BackgroundImageDrawMode.None
member.summary: The background image is not painted. The background is solid.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.UI.BackgroundImageDrawMode.Tile
member.summary: The image is painted as tiles in a floor to cover the area.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.UI.BackgroundImageDrawMode.Center
member.summary: The image is displayed in the center if the area is larger than the image. If the image is larger than the area, the image is placed in the center of the area and the outside edges are clipped.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.UI.BackgroundImageDrawMode.Stretch
member.summary: The image is stretched or shrunk to fit the size of the area.

member.summary: Gets the maximum size of the panel.
member.returns: Returns a System.Drawing.Size that represents the limits for the panel size.
member.remarks: If the Width and Height of the MaximumSize are -1 this method returns the MaximumSize specified as default in the panel manager. If the Width and Height are 0 the panel will have no limits other than the size of its container.
